full_description:
MSI SPATIUM S270 480GB 2.5-Inch SATAIII SSD

The MSI SPATIUM S270 480GB 2.5-Inch SATAIII SSD, a powerful storage option intended to take your system to the next level, is now available. This SSD is built for the SATA III interface, with read/write rates of up to 500/450 MB/s, providing for quick data transfer and decreased game load times. Despite its compact size, the SPATIUM S270 has 480GB of storage space in a 2.5" SATA form factor. Built-in data security and error-correction features increase the durability and lifetime of NAND flash storage, giving you peace of mind about your critical data. This SSD, with a capacity of up to 500 TBW, is appropriate for both desktop and laptop applications, making it a versatile storage option for a wide range of systems. With the MSI SPATIUM S270 480GB 2.5-Inch SATAIII SSD, you can satisfy your craving for speed right now.

The MSI SPATIUM M371 2TB NVMe M.2 SSD is a high-performance storage option that will improve the speed and responsiveness of your desktop or notebook computer. This SSD complies to the NVMe 1.3 standard and has a PCIe Gen3x4 interface, offering excellent compatibility and efficiency in data transfer. With sequential read rates of up to 2350MB/s and write speeds of up to 1900MB/s, the M371 delivers fast data access and smooth performance for a wide range of workloads, from gaming to content production. Its 2TB capacity in the M.2 2280 form factor provides ample storage space for your increasing collection of data, apps, and entertainment. The MSI SPATIUM M371 has a high endurance level of up to 480 TBW (Terabytes Written), making it a solid choice for consumers who want resilience and longevity from their storage devices. This SSD is flexible since it can be used in both desktop and laptop computers, making it a good choice for users across many computing platforms. full_description:
MSI SPATIUM M480 PRO 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD

The MSI SPATIUM M480 PRO 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD, a high-performance storage solution that takes advantage of the latest technologies to deliver exceptional speed, reliability, and efficiency. Equipped with cutting-edge features, this SSD is designed to elevate your computing experience, whether you're a gamer, content creator, or a power user. At its core, the M480 PRO utilizes the PCIe NVMe 1.4 Gen4x4 interface, harnessing the full potential of PCIe 4.0 to achieve blazing-fast sequential read and write speeds of up to 7400 MB/s and 6000 MB/s, respectively. With these impressive transfer rates, you can enjoy lightning-fast loading times and seamless multitasking, even during resource-intensive tasks. The heart of this SSD is powered by the PHISON E18 controller, renowned for its reliability and efficiency. Paired with a 1GB DDR4 DRAM cache, the M480 PRO ensures smooth and consistent performance, allowing you to tackle demanding workloads and experience unrivaled responsiveness during gameplay and productivity tasks. The use of the latest 3D NAND flash technology enables the M480 PRO to offer a generous 1TB storage capacity while maintaining a compact M.2 2280 form factor. This combination of high storage density and a small footprint makes it an ideal choice for modern computing systems with limited space. The M480 PRO doesn't just focus on performance; it also prioritizes data security and longevity. With built-in data security and error-correction capabilities, your valuable data is protected, and the endurance and longevity of the NAND flash are extended. This feature ensures that your SSD will withstand heavy usage and remain reliable for years to come. Thanks to its M.2 2280 form factor, the SPATIUM M480 PRO is easy to install into various computing systems, including external SSD enclosures, desktops, or laptops. This ease of installation allows you to quickly upgrade your existing system or build a new one with minimal hassle. The MSI SPATIUM M480 PRO 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD delivers exceptional performance, reliability, and versatility. Whether you're a professional content creator, a hardcore gamer, or a multitasking enthusiast, this SSD empowers you to handle heavy workloads, open applications at lightning speed, and enjoy a seamless computing experience.
